dimensions: Warp x Weft: 121 x 92 cm (47 5/8 x 36 1/4 in.)
title: Textile
medium:
Medium: cotton, copper foil, plastic
Technique: plain weave
description: Drapery material commissioned by Philip Johnson for the Rockefeller guest house, with a shimmering vertical stripe of pearl and copper-colored metallic threads.  The warp is of irregularly distributed pearly plastic and copper-colored Lurex strips; the weft is beige chenille yarn.
name: Textile
